import { Container, Row, Col } from "react-bootstrap"; import IServicesItem from "./IServicesItem"; import { useContext } from "react"; import { ModeContext } from "./ModeContext"; function IServices() { const [show, setShow, language, setLanguage, mobile] = useContext(ModeContext); const sty = { height: mobile.iservice }; function handleShow() { setShow(true); } return (


{/* Stack the columns on mobile by making one full-width and the other half-width */}
); } export default IServices;
